info.title: DeciFlow API
info.description: API documentation for DeciFlow - Purchase Request Approval System

get.description: Get all requests pending approval for the current user's role

post.description: Approve a request at current approval step
Reject a request at current approval step
Return a request to requester for revision

comment.example: Please provide more details about the vendor

get.description: Get all attachments for a request

post.description: Upload a file attachment to a request

get.description: Get all audit logs across all requests (super admin only)
Get all audit logs for a specific request

200.description: List of audit logs for the request

post.description: Authenticate user and return access token

get.description: Get paginated list of requests with optional filters

post.description: Create a new purchase request in DRAFT status

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific request

put.description: Update a request in DRAFT status

post.description: Create a new approval rule (admin only)

put.description: Update an existing approval rule (admin only)

sanctum.description: Enter your bearer token in the format: Bearer {token}
